13640.「義賊のヤツらめ……。\n なぜ このオレが あの偽善者どもに\n 引けを とら:
Those goody two-shoed bastards... why should I
give in to those hypocrites!?

13641.「オレが 間違ってるっていうのか！？\n 答えろよ ギャスモン！:
Am I in the wrong here? Answer me,
Buntzenberner!

13642.「答エナド 必要ナイ。\n 汝ハ 求メレバ 得ラレルノダ。\n ソノ欲望コソガ:
THERE IS NO NEED TO ANSWER. SEEK, AND YOU
SHALL FIND. YOUR DESIRES ARE YOUR GREATEST
STRENGTH...

13643.「へへっ そうか。それじゃあ\n 今よりも 強い魔物を操るチカラをくれ！\n 旅:
Heheh, is that so? In that case, give me the
power to control even stronger monsters! I'll
make the Whirlwind Brigade even bigger!

13644.「マタ 魔物ヲ 操ルちからカ……。\n ソロソロ 汝自身 強クナル\n 必要ガ:
YOU WISH TO CONTROL MORE MONSTERS...? WHY NOT
MAKE YOURSELF STRONGER INSTEAD...?

13645.「ソノ手デ 憎シミヲ 断ツタメニ……。:
SO THAT YOU CAN SATISFY YOUR HATRED WITH YOUR
OWN HANDS...

13647.「何しにきやがった。\n オレを 正しい道に進ませようとか\n ふざけたこと 考:
What are ya doin' here? Don't tell me you're
here to set me on the proper path.

13648.「チッ！ 親父と同じ 偽善者の目……。\n その目を見てると むしずが走るぜ！\:
Tch! Ya got the same hypocritical eyes as my
pops... lookin' at 'em makes my stomach turn!
Do you even know what he did!?

13649.「ムーチョが 町長の家に盗みに入った日……\n オレの母さんは 生死の境を さま:
The day Mucho robbed the mayor's house... my
mom was on the verge of death, after years of
being sick.

13650.「うちは 貧乏でよ。薬を買う金もなかった……。\n そんなとき 町長の財宝を持っ:
We were poor. We couldn't even afford to buy
medicine... then Mucho came to our house with
the mayor's treasure. I was jumpin' with joy!

13651.「……けどよ！ ムーチョは……\n 親父は 母さんの まくらもとに立っても\n:
...But then! Mucho... pops stood at mom's
bedside, then left without leavin' any of it
behind!

13652.「次の日に 母さんは 死んだよ。\n 親父は泣いてたが 今思えば あのときの涙も:
Mom died the next day. Pops was crying, but
lookin' back on it, I bet those were nothin'
but crocodile tears.

13653.「オレは ムーチョへの復讐を誓い 家を出た。\n ……そして ここにいるギャスモ:
I ran away from home, swearing revenge on
Mucho... then I ran into Buntzenberner here,
and gained the ability to control monsters!

13654.「盗賊なんて しょせん悪党……。\n そのことを 世間に教えてやるために\n つ:
Thieves are nothin' but villains... that's why
I formed the Whirlwind Brigade, to remind the
world of that fact!

13655.「でもよ…… もう つむじ風の旅団なんて\n まわりくどいことは やめるぜ。\n:
But... I'm done with runnin' the Whirlwind
Brigade. I'm just gonna kill ya'll myself!

13656.「ギャスモン！ さあ オレにチカラをくれ！\n こいつらを ひねりつぶすための\:
Buntzenberner! Give me power! The power to
crush them all...!

13657.「スベテハ 欲望ノ オモムクママニ……。: ALL FOR THE SAKE OF YOUR DESIRES...

13658.「おお…… みなぎる みなぎるぞ！！！\n 黒いチカラが オレの身体に………ッ！:
Ohh... I feel it, I can feel it!! The dark
power coursin' through my body...!!

13660.「ブルルルルッ！\n すべての義賊に 死を……！\n 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ:
Grrrrr! Death to all thieves...! Death,
death....!!

13661.「ブルルルルッ！！ 何度来ても同じこと！\n 貴様ら 義賊は オレには勝てん！！:
Grrrrr! No matter how many times you come
back, it'll end the same! Ya self-righteous
bastards can't win! I'm the one who's right!

13662.「ブルルルルッ！\n すべての義賊に 死を……！\n 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ:
Grrrrr! Death to all thieves...! Death,
death....!!

13663.「ブ…ブルルルル……。\n 憎しみに身をまかせ チカラを得た\n このオレが な:
G-grrrrr... Even when empowered by my hatred,
how could I lose to this self-righteous
thief...?

13664.「憎しみが 足りないのか……？\n 義賊を…… 親父を 憎む心が……。:
Is my hatred not enough...? Hatred for
thieves... hatred for my pops...

13666.「アンタは 母親の思いを 踏みにじる気かい！！\n 妻を救えなかった 親父さんの:
You're tramplin' all over your mother's
feelings! Haven't you ever thought how your
father felt when he couldn't save his wife!?

13667.「アンタの親父さんね このままじゃいけないって\n あたいに 真相を話してくれた:
Your father told me everything because he
wanted all of this to stop. So unclog those
ears and listen up!

13668.「……町長の家に盗みに入った あの日\n ワシは お前の母を 助けられるだけのカ:
...The day I robbed the mayor's house, I was
going to leave behind the money needed to help
your mother.

13670.「私たちの約束を 忘れたのですか……。\n そう言って カネを置いていくことを\:
"Did you forget our promise...?" She was
strongly against me leaving the money behind.

13672.「ワシが ムーチョになると決めたとき\n 妻は いっさいの盗品を 自分たちのため:
When I decided to become Mucho, my wife asked
me to promise never to use anything I stole
for ourselves.

13673.「盗んだものを 少しでも 自分たちのために\n 使ってしまえば それは義賊ではな:
She said that if I used even a little bit of
the loot for myself, I was no virtuous
thief... but just another common crook.

13674.「そして 私利私欲のために 動くのではなく\n 人のために尽くすことを 固く誓い:
And so, with a firm vow to help others and
never profit for myself, I became Mucho...

13675.「ねえ チャムール。\n ふたりの心意気……。\n アンタには もう わからない:
Hey, Chamour. Do you understand how those two
felt now...?

13676.「この オルゴールの音色を聞いても\n 母親の優しさを 思いだせなかったのかい？:
Did the sound of this music box not remind you
of your mother's kindness?

13679.「憎シミノ心ガ 消エタ……。\n コノ器ハ 使エヌ。欲望ガ足リヌ……。:
THE HATRED IN HIS HEART IS GONE... THIS VESSEL
CANNOT BE USED. THERE IS NOT ENOUGH DESIRE...

13681.「すまなかったなあ チャムール……。\n もう お前を ひとりにはせん。\n や:
I'm so sorry, Chamour... I'll never leave you
alone again. Let's start over. Together...

13682.「……グスッ。ダメだね……。\n あたい こういうのには 弱いんだ。:
...*sniffle* Aw, man... I have a weakness for
this kind of stuff.

13683.「……さてと これにて 一件落着だね。\n つむじ風の旅団も いなくなったし\n:
...Anyway, looks like that settles it. The
Whirlwind Brigade is done for, and the feud
between Budecho and his son is over.

13684.「<cs_pchero> 今回も また大活躍だったね。\n その礼をするからさ\:
You did a real good job here,
<cs_pchero>. Come to Gatara's tavern so I can
give you a proper reward.

13685.「では ワシから 礼をさせてくれ。: Now then, allow me to thank you.

13686.「<pc>よ。\n お前には オルゴールの件や\n 今回の件で 本当に 世話にな:
I really appreciate all the help you've given
me over the music box and this whole mess,
<pc>.

13687.「その恩返しに 盗賊の必殺技を\n お前に 伝授しよう。\n さあ 目を つむる:
To repay the favor, I'll teach you a special
technique for thieves. Now, close your eyes.

13689.「その恩返しに これを受け取ってくれ。\n 大事に 使うんだぞ。:
Take this to repay the favor. Take good care
of it.

13690.「お前は 盗賊を極められる器だ。\n 時が満ちたら ワシの所へ来るがいい。\n:
You have the potential of a master thief. Come
speak to me when the time is right. Of course,
don't forget to do so as a thief.

13691.「とっておきの 試練を用意しといてやろう。\n では またな。:
I've prepared a special trial for you. See you
then.

13692.「ブ…ブデチョのオッサン！\n あ！ いや！ ムーチョ先生っ！！: M-Mr. Budecho! Ah! No! Master Mucho!!

13693.「あたいを 弟子にしてくれないかい！？\n あたい マスク・ド・ムーチョに あこ:
Will you please make me your apprentice!? The
reason I became a thief was because I wanted
to be just like Masc de Mucho! Please!

13694.「すまんな。ワシは もう\n 弟子は とらないことにしてるんだ。:
Sorry. I'm not interested in taking on any
more apprentices.

13695.「もう……ってことは\n すでに お弟子さんが いるのかい！？: Does that mean... you already have a student!?

13696.「どこで ワシの正体を知ったのか\n ちょっと前に 怪盗ポイなんとかって女の子が:
I don't know how she found out who I was, but
not long ago, a girl calling herself Phantom
Thief Poi-something-or-other came to me.

13697.「もともと 弟子をとるつもりは なかったが\n かわいい顔で 熱心に頼みこんでき:
I had no intention of taking any apprentices,
but when she asked me so enthusiastically with
that cute face, I couldn't resist.

13698.「ところが そのコ なかなか スジがよくて\n 今は 彼女の指導で 手いっぱいな:
Besides, that kid is pretty good at what she does, and right now I've got my hands full just teaching her. That's just how it is.
Hahahahah!
